item.title: Analysing Multi-Task Regression via Random Matrix Theory with Application to Time Series Forecasting
item.description: This paper presents a novel theoretical framework for multi-task regression using random matrix theory, offering precise performance estimations and a closed-form solution for optimal hyperparameter t…
